name: proof-of-training-quality
description: Proof of training Quality for distributed system

scripts.node1: CATEGORY='chicken' SECRET='NODE1' HTTP_PORT=3000 P2P_PORT=5000 node app.js
scripts.node2: CATEGORY='tiger' SECRET='NODE2' HTTP_PORT=3001 P2P_PORT=5001 PEERS='ws://localhost:5000' node app.js
scripts.node3: CATEGORY='lion' SECRET='NODE3' HTTP_PORT=3002 P2P_PORT=5002 PEERS='ws://localhost:5000,ws://localhost:5001' node app.js
scripts.node4: CATEGORY='lion' SECRET='NODE4' HTTP_PORT=3003 P2P_PORT=5003 PEERS='ws://localhost:5000,ws://localhost:5001,ws://localhost:5002' node app.js

author: Hieu Vo
